query:
UPDATE instance
             SET bridge_path = ?,
                 from_addr = ?,
                 to_addr = ?,
                 network = ?,
                 amount = ?,
                 status = ?,
                 goat_txid = ?,
                 btc_txid = ?,
                 pegin_txid = ?,
                 input_uxtos = ?,
                 fee = ?,
                 updated_at = ?
            WHERE instance_id = ?
